translation.en: Everyone's heard of the city that never sleeps.

translation.en: This is a story about three such mothers and their three sons.

You guys are such profound assholes.
-It's time, Daniel. -All right, I know. I'm still deciding.

-You're getting engaged! -Yes.

translation.en: -I mean, no, we're going to Matt's. -D, I love you, but get out.

Look...
You are happy with Erin.

sixth grade.
You said you'd have your first novel finished by the end of the year,

translation.en: three ends-of-the-years ago.
-Horrible pep talk. -These are the facts.
-She's hot. I'm gonna do it if you don't. -That's a better pep talk.
translation.ko: 에린은 예쁘니까 네가 안 하면 내가 한다 - 정말? - 갑자기 힘이 나네

translation.en: -Erin! -All right.
Baby! Erin!
This, by the way,

translation.en: She's gonna say, "That's the night that he stormed up the stairs,

and you asked if she would marry you.
That is novel material. Novel material.

translation.en: We were there for every big life event,

translation.en: and now we're lucky if we hear about anything at all.

translation.en: Erin!
Daniel?
What the fuck?
There's a lot you don't know as mothers.
translation.ko: "NETFLIX 제공" 엄마가 되는 건 막막한 일이에요

translation.en: In fact, that's what bonded us
when the boys' friendship launched our friendship

translation.en: on a playground in Poughkeepsie.
We've been through so much together.
Graduations, proms,
skinned knees, emergency room visits,
translation.ko: 졸업식, 학교 무도회, 무릎 상처 병원 응급실 면회

translation.en: family vacations, bad days, bad jobs,

translation.en: and at every scary and unfamiliar stage,
the answer was always "friends".
That's Gillian.
She still has kids in the house,
they're just not hers.
Why are you teaching today?
It's just one lesson.
He wants to play this later for his mother.
He still likes her.
Daniel texted you already.

It's a lie.

And that's Helen.
She never ages.
At least, not publicly.
Frank, I have to run a few errands before I go to Carol's.

translation.en: Are you spray-painting the top of your head again?

translation.en: Unless you're sitting.

-Oh, I'm so glad we're still doing this! -Happy Mother's Day!

translation.ko: 내가 뭘 알겠니? 난 그냥 인터넷 스토커에 불과해

translation.en: And I was wrong.
I always wondered what it'd be like to hear you say those words.
translation.ko: 엄마가 그런 말을 하면 어떨지 늘 궁금하긴 했는데

translation.en: And as it turns out, you were actually right, so...
No.
She's a lovely woman, and you're a lovely man.
translation.ko: 에린은 사랑스러운 아이고 너도 사랑스러운 아이야

translation.en: So, if you have that ring,
and if she is the love of your life,
then do something before it is too late.
Because for all you know, she might be packing her bags and leaving town...
translation.ko: 왜냐면 에린이 짐을 꾸려서 이 도시를 떠나거나...

translation.en: or something.
I love you. You're a grown man.
I just hope you do what is best for your life and your future.
translation.ko: 네 인생과 미래를 위해 최선의 선택을 내리렴

translation.en: Did you see her somewhere or something?
Ma, wait.
Mom! Did you break into her place, too?
Hello!
Is there a reason you're following me?
Paul said you wouldn't listen to us.
translation.ko: 말 안 들으실 거라고 폴이 그랬어요

translation.en: It's okay, honey. It's okay.
What is it that you want?
I don't want...
anything. I'm not asking for anything. I'm just...
translation.ko: 원하는 건... 없어요 부탁하고 싶은 것도 없고요

translation.en: saying what I am.
translation.ko: 그냥 제가 어떤 사람인지 말하고 싶어요

translation.en: A grandmother.
She has grandmothers.
I brought a few...
hundred gifts.
Look, we talked about this before the birth.
We adore Paul.
We do, and we want Ella to know Paul.
translation.ko: 우린 폴을 좋아해요, 정말이에요 엘라에게도 소개해주고 싶고요

translation.en: We hope she gets some of his great qualities. That's why we chose him.
translation.ko: 폴의 장점을 닮기를 바라서 폴을 선택한 거예요

translation.en: But he's not the dad.
He's a sperm donor, okay?
We all agreed. We signed papers.
But...
now that I have her...
and now that I know what it feels like...
when she has a baby, if...
translation.ko: 얘도 자라서 아이를 낳게 될 수도 있겠죠

translation.en: she has a baby...
if I couldn't see that baby...
translation.ko: 근데 그 아기를 볼 수 없다면

translation.en: I'd probably chase that baby all over the city, too.
translation.ko: 저라도 그 아이 꽁무니를 따라다닐 것 같긴 해요

translation.en: It's okay, honey.
She looks just like Paul did.
Would you like to hold her?
-Say hi. -Hi.
Hi!
Hi!
-Hi. -That's a good girl.
I want to be a good grandmother. A good one. Not a bad one.
translation.ko: 좋은 할머니가 되고 싶구나 나쁜 할머니 말고

translation.en: Honey, five weeks is not late.
Five weeks is abandonment.
It sounds like she waited a long time for you.
All right, Ma. You know what?
You and Dad have, like, your perfect story, so, you wouldn't...
translation.ko: 아빠랑 엄마 사이는 너무 완벽해서 이해 못 하세요

translation.en: No. There is no perfect story.
In fact...
years ago, your father had an infidelity.
translation.ko: 너희 아빠는 오래전에 바람피운 적이 있어

translation.en: Before I was born or after?
You were 16.
How'd you forgive him?
It wasn't easy.
I went crazy for a little while.
I went on this... fakakta five-week egg diet.
translation.ko: 내가... 웬 이상한 달걀 다이어트를 5주나 했었던 거 기억나니?

translation.en: You remember?
translation.ko: 웬 이상한 달걀 다이어트를 5주나 했었던 거 기억나니?

translation.en: Yes, I do. You were, like...
translation.ko: 기억나요, 그때 뭐더라... 닭을 키우려고 했잖아요

translation.en: -You wanted chickens or something. -Yeah.
translation.ko: 기억나요, 그때 뭐더라... 닭을 키우려고 했잖아요 - 그래! - 닭장이었나요?

translation.en: A chicken coop?
But... I realized...
I still wanted your dad.
And I decided to do the harder thing and stay.
translation.ko: 그래서 힘들긴 하지만 부부로 남기로 결정한 거야

translation.en: But I think what really...
made it possible for me to forgive him...
translation.ko: 내가 아빠를 용서할 수 있었던 건

translation.en: was...
he never fully forgave himself.
Mom, I really admire you.
And I get why you're sharing this story with me.
I just don't think I'm built like that.
This is your life.
This big, bruised, bloody, beautiful thing.
translation.ko: 이 장대하고 쓰라리고 피 터지지만 아름다운 인생...

translation.en: This is your life. I'm not going to tell you what to do.
translation.ko: 그게 바로 네 인생이야 난 너한테 뭐라고 하지 않을게

translation.en: Since when?
Since today.
-Okay. -Daniel, hey.
You have been under the water for a long time.
But when you come up,
you need to decide what life you want.
You got this.
I love you.
Ma.
I think I'm locked out of my apartment.
translation.ko: 집 열쇠를 두고 나온 것 같아요

translation.en: Use the window. That's what I do.
I'm out!
Hi.
You're back.
What's the matter, sweetheart?
You and Paul have a fight?
Several.
And Gillian. And Carol.
We didn't even drive back together.
Everyone is...
sick of me, and... so am I.
Frank, why did you marry me?
Well, I think what everybody wonders is why you married me.
translation.ko: 사람들은 자기가 왜 나랑 결혼했는지 궁금해하던데

translation.en: No, really.
Why?
You're kind.
And you're smart. You're funny as hell.
You have a lot of love to give.
-I do, right? -Yes.
And you're opinionated, and passionate.
Sometimes you have sharp edges, and I like that.
translation.ko: 가끔은 날카로울 때도 있지만 그것도 좋아

translation.en: You tell it like it is.
My...
looks?
Oh, you think I married you for your personality?
translation.ko: 설마 성격 때문에 결혼했다고 생각하는 거야?

translation.en: You come in a very...
beautiful package.
But that's not all there is to Helen Halston.
I am so lucky.
I'm so...
-Oh, really? -Yes. We're doing it.
Thanks for coming.
Your texts wore me down.
Did you bring a pen?
-Hey, Mrs. Walker. More flowers. -It must be some mistake.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 워커 씨 꽃이 또 왔네요 실수일 거예요 꽃 주문한 적 없어요

translation.en: I didn't order any flowers.
translation.ko: 실수일 거예요 꽃 주문한 적 없어요

translation.en: There's a note with them.
Her favorite flower is... an Iris.
Well, thank you, Shawn.
And I know that because she told me
when she asked me for ten things I know about her.
-Then you can't use it. -What? Yes, I can. It's a freebie.
translation.ko: 그럼 그건 못 써요 왜 안 돼요? 공짜잖아요

translation.en: If you can't think of ten things you know about your mother
without one of them being something she flat-out told you,
translation.ko: 엄마에 대한 것 10개를 생각할 수 없다면

translation.en: then you're a shitty son.
I am not a shitty son.
Then think about why you love her and write it down.
translation.ko: 그럼 왜 어머님을 사랑하는지 생각하면서 적어보세요

translation.en: I know she loved my father, and he wasn't that lovable.
translation.ko: 아버지를 사랑하셨어요 그리 사랑스러운 분은 아니었죠

translation.en: He was always working.
Even when we played, it was work.
My mom was the one who taught me how to have fun.
When I was a kid, she used to...
read me these bedtime stories, and...
she'd pretend there was one more page.
translation.ko: 책 끝에 한 장이 더 있는 척하셨죠

translation.en: And we'd make up a new ending.
-Write that down. -Oh, yeah.
She did a lot of art when I was a kid.
Pen and ink note cards, oil paintings from photographs.
translation.ko: 펜으로 카드도 만들고 사진을 보고 유화도 그리셨죠

translation.en: This one time, she did this...
great mural on my wall.
One: You loved my father.
Two: You taught me how to have fun.
Three: You could have been an artist.
Number four: She thinks you're a good person.
No, she doesn't. She told me.
She told you that she thinks that I'm good?
You could write she's the only person who thinks you're good.
translation.ko: 당신이 좋은 사람이라고 생각하는 유일한 사람이라고 쓰세요

translation.en: I never knew that she thought that.
Four: You're the only person in the world who thinks I'm good.
translation.ko: 넷, 저를 좋은 사람으로 봐주는 유일한 분이세요

translation.en: Five: You made me feel loved and safe.
translation.ko: 다섯, 사랑받는 기분과 안정감을 느끼게 해주셨어요

translation.en: Six: You cut up fruit for my snacks even when I begged for junk food.
translation.ko: 여섯, 군것질하고 싶다고 애원해도 간식으로 과일을 주셨어요

translation.en: Seven: You still call me, even when I ignore you.
Thank you.
Eight:
The only times I've ever seen you angry
are times you deserved to be angrier.
translation.ko: 전부 더 크게 화낼 만했던 상황이었어요

translation.en: Nine:
You love to dance.
Ten:
You're my mother.
Eleven:
You taught me there is room in every story...
translation.ko: 모든 이야기에는 더 나은 결말의 여지가 있다고

translation.en: for a better ending.
Erin!
Erin!
Erin!
Erin!
Erin!
Erin!
Erin, wait up!
I really... I need to...
get to the gym more often. What are you doing?
translation.ko: - 헬스장에 더 자주 가야겠어 - 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm moving to L.A.
Well...
-Can I talk to you first? -About what?
translation.ko: - 얘기 좀 할 수 있어? - 무슨 얘기?

translation.en: About us.
Oh, my... It's too late, Daniel. My whole life is in this truck.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 너무 늦었어, 대니얼 내 인생을 이 트럭에 실었다고

translation.en: That's funny. I was just thinking the same thing.
You're not gonna stop me.
Okay.
Okay.
Can we talk on the way?
-You don't have anything to do? -Please.
-You're gonna drive me to L.A.? -I'm coming to L.A.
translation.ko: - LA까지 운전해준다고? - 나도 LA에 갈 거야

translation.en: I'm coming with you.
Coming to L.A.
I'm sorry. Sorry!
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry, too.
-Do you know how to drive one of these? -I have no idea what I'm doing.
translation.ko: - 이런 차 운전은 해봤어? - 뭐가 뭔지 전혀 모르겠다

translation.en: Hey, where you going?
I swear she looks like both of you.
To be honest, we think she looks like your mother.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말하면 네 엄마 닮은 것 같아

translation.en: Acts like it.
-Oh, my goodness! -Speaking of the devil.
translation.ko: - 맙소사! - 호랑이도 제 말 하니 오네

translation.en: -Or angel, depending who you ask. -Who's that?
Grandma loves Ella!
Yay, look who it is!
-Grandma! -There's Grandma!
-Say hi to Grandma. -And you,
-and you, and you. -Hi.
-And you. -Hi.
This is kind of a complicated garment, isn't it?
My mother's at her son's semi-Jewish wedding, and she's still complaining.
You're not supposed to see the bride before the wedding.
translation.ko: 예식 전에는 신부 보면 안 돼

translation.en: I know, but we broke a few rules already. I think we can break one more.
translation.ko: 규칙은 이미 몇 개 어겼으니 하나쯤은 더 괜찮지 않아?

translation.en: Well, he's got a point. We can show him.
Thanks, Ma.
For everything.
No one's gonna notice.
There's just one little thing, though.
translation.ko: 한 가지 작은 일이 있기는 해

translation.en: It's too late for a thing.
translation.ko: 그런 얘기 하기엔 늦은 것 같은데

translation.en: I know, but this is really an important thing.
I think we should rehearse the kiss again.
translation.ko: 키스를 다시 연습해야 할 것 같아

translation.en: Hi!
I'm still so angry, I can barely stand to look at you.
translation.ko: 아직도 너무 화가 나서 널 쳐다보기도 힘들어

translation.en: I know. Thank you for the invitation.
I invited Frank. You're his plus one.
-Did you get my messages? -Yeah, about 20 of them.
-Did you get my texts? -"Stop calling me."
You know...
I am kind of responsible for this whole wedding.
translation.ko: 이 결혼식도 따지고 보면 내 덕 아니니?

translation.en: I mean, if we hadn't gone to New York...
So, now we're considering that trip a success?
Well, look at where we are, and...
And Carol's in Italy.
She didn't even RSVP.
She's probably too busy painting, eating pizza,
translation.ko: 그림 그리고 피자 먹느라 너무 바쁜가 봐

translation.en: taking Italian lovers...
I'm sure she's miserable since she sold that house.
translation.ko: 그 집을 팔고 나서 속상했을 거야

translation.en: Don't start the wedding without us!
I knew she would come! I missed her so much more than I missed you.
translation.ko: 올 줄 알았어! 너보다 캐럴이 더 보고 싶었거든

translation.en: Same here. Only double.
Oh, it's just his date.
She's too old to be his date. She's, like, his age.
translation.ko: 여자애가 너무 늙은 거 아니니? 맷이랑 비슷한 나이잖아

translation.en: Oh, my God!
Oh, my God!
Yes!
I heard there was cake.
You don't call, you don't write.
translation.ko: 전화도 안 하고 편지도 안 쓰더니

translation.en: Oh, we missed you so much!
-You look so glamorous. -So do you.
By the way, I brought bourbon.
Oh, no! Not again!
Of course you did.
You're driving.
All right.
Get out of the car!
Let me out!
Oh, I'm out of breath.
